Comments_List: I developed my vocal technique, focusing on lip position especially this semester, and beginning my study of singing in French. I learned and studied 3 new pieces and worked on some new vocal exercises.
Circular breathing, posture, finger independence techniques
Lessons are essential for continued vocal study--I wouldn't change the structure of how lessons are offered.
If you are a musician looking for good quality lessons at Yale, no question--do it!
